info.description: Retrieves all the foreign exchange open deals as on today
info.title: API to retrieve foreign exchange open deals as on today

get.summary: Retrieves all the foreign exchange active deals as on today
get.description: Retrieves the foreign exchange outstanding(active) deals as on today.

parameters.name: dealType
parameters.description: Foreign Exchange deal type. Allowed values: - SP(spot) - FW(forward) - SW(Swap)

parameters.name: counterparty
parameters.description: The counterparty ID  for the  deal.

parameters.name: swapReference
parameters.description: As the near and far leg of the swap have separate reference number, the swap reference is the near leg reference in the far leg and far leg reference in the near leg of a FX swap deal.

parameters.name: buyCurrency
parameters.description: ISO Currency code for the bought currency.

parameters.name: buyAmount
parameters.description: Amount bought in the FX deal.

parameters.name: sellCurrency
parameters.description: ISO Currency code for the sold currency.

parameters.name: sellAmount
parameters.description: Amount sold in the FX deal.

parameters.name: dealDate
parameters.description: Date on which the deal was agreed.

parameters.name: ourAccountPay
parameters.description: Account from which payment is  made.

parameters.name: ourAccountRecieve
parameters.description: Account from which payment is received.

parameters.name: dealerDesk
parameters.description: The dealer/desk responsible for monitoring and managing the currency positions.

parameters.name: unevenSwap
parameters.description: Identifier for a FX uneven swap  (the swap base currency amount in near and far leg are not the same).

parameters.name: forwardForwardSwap
parameters.description: A FX swap where both the near and the far leg have a value date greater than spot value date.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

ourAccountPay.description: Account from which payment is  made.
Account from which payment is  made.

ourAccountRecieve.description: Account from which payment is received.
Account from which payment is received.

dealType.description: Foreign Exchange deal type. Allowed values: - SP(spot) - FW(forward) - SW(Swap)

counterparty.description: The counterparty ID  for the  deal.

counterpartyName.description: The counterparty name for the forex deal.

dealDate.description: Date on which the deal was agreed.

buyCurrency.description: ISO Currency code for the bought currency.

buyAmount.description: Amount bought in the FX deal.

sellCurrency.description: ISO Currency code for the sold currency.

sellAmount.description: Amount sold in the FX deal.

valueDate.description: Indicates the value date on which the underlying accounting entry is to be given value (for interest purposes)

exchangeRate.description: Contains the exchange rate returned from the system. i.e. For entries over foreign currency accounts, this contains the rate which used to convert the currency amount to the local equivalent at the time of the originating transaction.

unevenSwap.description: Identifier for a FX uneven swap  (the swap base currency amount in near and far leg are not the same).

swapReference.description: As the near and far leg of the swap have separate reference number, the swap reference is the near leg reference in the far leg and far leg reference in the near leg of a FX swap deal.

forwardForwardSwap.description: A FX swap where both the near and the far leg have a value date greater than spot value date.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business

code.description: The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message caused by server

type.description: The identifier of error type: System
